products.name: Tobbles Neo
products.description:
Tobbles Neo - bright and cheerful colors, the physics of motion - and the addition of more tactile clout!

The unique grippable texture of Tobbles Neo awakens touch. See those gentle, playful curves? They truly enliven tactile experiences.

Young minds revel in stacking, toppling, and the discovery of endless ingenuity with Tobbles Neo. Six uniquely weighted pieces balance, neatly nest, and incessantly spin beyond your expectations.

Gratifying to hold in your hands, weighted to invite investigation, and likely to be swiped from your possession.

Little hands canâ€™t get enough of the stacking, toppling, spinning, balancing, wobbling, tilting, and wiggling! Another welcome invitation to timeless play.
